:root{--bodyBg:#e6ed3b;--mainBackground:rgba(0,0,0,0.01);--favListBg:#fff;--resBg:rgba(0,0,0,0.2);--secondBackground:#fcf7fc;--mainFont:"Roboto",sans-serif;--logoFont:"Montserrat",sans-serif;--buttonBg:#383738;--mainColor:#383738;--starsBg:#a8a8a8}@import
